constants.name: core_transport_identifier
constants.header: Translation table for different types of transport coefficients.

int.name: unspecified
int.description: Unspecified transport type

int.name: combined
int.description: Combination of data from all available transport models

int.name: transport_solver
int.description: Output from a transport solver

int.name: background
int.description: Background transport level

int.name: database
int.description: Transport specified by a database entry

int.name: anomalous
int.description: Derived from semi-empirical models

int.name: advanced_fluid
int.description: Transport based on advanced fluid theory

int.name: driftkinetic_global
int.description: Transport based on drift-kinetic theory solved in a global geometry

int.name: driftkinetic_fluxtube
int.description: Transport based on drift-kinetic theory solved in a flux tube geometry

int.name: gyrofluid_global
int.description: Transport based on gyro-fluid theory solved in a global geometry

int.name: gyrofluid_fluxtube
int.description: Transport based on gyro-fluid theory solved in a flux tube geometry

int.name: gyrokinetic_global
int.description: Transport based on gyro-kinetic theory solved in a global geometry

int.name: gyrokinetic_fluxtube
int.description: Transport based on gyro-kinetic theory solved in a flux tube geometry

int.name: kinetic_global
int.description: Transport based on kinetic theory (no gyro-kinetic assumption) solved in a global geometry

int.name: kinetic_fluxTube
int.description: Transport based on kinetic theory (no gyro-kinetic assumption) solved in the flux tube geometry

int.name: quasilinear_gyrofluid
int.description: Transport based on quasi-linear gyro-fluid theory

int.name: quasilinear_gyrokinetic
int.description: Transport based on quasi-linear gyro-kinetic theory

int.name: multimode
int.description: Transport based on a Multi Mode Model

int.name: mhd
int.description: Transport arising from the MHD frequency modes

int.name: ntm
int.description: Transport arising from the presence of NTMs

int.name: sawteeth
int.description: Transport arising from the presence of sawteeth

int.name: elm_continuous
int.description: Continuous ELM model --- gives the ELM averaged profile

int.name: elm_resolved
int.description: Time resolved ELM model

int.name: pedestal
int.description: Transport level to give edge pedestal

int.name: not_provided
int.description: No data provided
